speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Gunnar Hökmark, on behalf of the Committee on Industry, Research and Energy, on building a European Policy on broadband ( 2006/2273(INI) ) ( A6-0193/2007 ).
original: President. The next item is the report by Gunnar Hökmark, on behalf of the Committee on Industry, Research and Energy, on building a European Policy on broadband ( 2006/2273(INI) ) ( A6-0193/2007 ).
